1101111111110000 0101010100110011 0 -> sum: 0011010100100011, cout: 1
1100111101011010 1011010101010101 0 -> sum: 1000010010101111, cout: 1
0111011101001111 0000111011110101 0 -> sum: 1000011001000100, cout: 0
1101111111010111 1101000100111101 1 -> sum: 1011000100010101, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
